app.title: Chatbot AI - Chat & Ask AI
app.description:
Meet the Smartest AI Chatbot – Powered by Advanced AI with Deep Reasoning Ability!

Unlock endless possibilities with the ultimate AI Chatbot for conversations, learning, and creativity. Whether you want to chat with AI, ask AI for insights, or explore new ideas, this app integrates cutting-edge AI models like DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro & Claude API to deliver intelligent, deep reasoning, and advanced computing capabilities.

Key Features:
- AI Chatbot built on DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro 1.5 & Claude API for fast computing, deep thinking, and insightful reasoning.
- Seek AI Search: Find tailored information instantly with AI-powered deep computing and smart retrieval.
- Ask AI Anything: From deep reasoning and critical thinking to general knowledge, get precise AI answers.
- Voice Mode: Use speech-to-text and text-to-speech for hands-free AI assistant interaction.
- AI Camera: Snap photos to seek answers, solve problems, or summarize content.
- Image Generation: Create unique visuals from AI-generated prompts for inspiration or fun.
- Deep Thinking Assistant: Access expert-level insights with AI-driven reasoning and computational logic.
- Context-Aware Responses: Get smart, personalized answers with deep AI analysis.

Practical Applications:
- Simplify tasks with a powerful AI assistant capable of deep thinking and problem-solving.
- Chat & ask with AI to brainstorm, analyze, and optimize productivity.
- Solve homework, seek deeper insights, or enhance your logical reasoning with AI-powered explanations.

Why Choose This AI Chatbot?
Developed on advanced AI models like DeepSeek, GPT-4o, Gemini 1.5 & Claude, this app delivers high-speed AI computing, deep logic, and precise AI-driven insights. Whether you need an AI Chatbot, an AI assistant, or simply want to ask AI anything, this app is your go-to AI-powered solution.

Download now and experience the smartest AI conversations today!

Disclaimer:
* This application is not officially associated with any third-party, application or company, and it does not purport to represent any such entities in any manner. The purpose of this application is solely to provide a mobile interface for interacting with an AI chatbot.

* We wish to emphasize that no data utilized by this application is collected or saved by us.

app.summary: Meet DeepSeek V3 & R1, open chat with smart assistant built on latest AI models

reviews.text: The app is absolutely fantastic, it solves problems and makes my work very easy. It is also very wonderful for learning anything. It is only limited to what it doesn't know or really makes sense. In all, I can recommend it in strong terms. Regards, Makanjuola Olumide Julius FCA ACTI MBA Please what's happening to Chatbot AI, the launching time is becoming so very slow and is very frustrating that I have to turn it of and relaunch upto over 3 times before I could access it. Please fix

Great but it should not ask for a Premium package. It should be Free like Google. More humanity needs to be added in this as well. For example it should tell about the human future in all aspects. (Mentally, Physically and Physiologically, Emotionally, Happily). It is absolutely fantastic.

The app is like fraud these days but it's like it's defrauding app. My last weekly subscription was 21 March, it should end by 27. The app is requesting for new payment with new subscription plan barely 2days after the last subscription. This is bad. If you want me to subscribe to new subscription plan, you will not continue to deduct or continue with the last automatic subscription. You'll let me know that the subscription plan has changed and I will change the plan when I have the money
reviews.replyText: Hello, we are sorry about this error. Please send your purchase invoice and error image requesting to repurchase the subscription package to Feedback for us to check. Whenever you need support, please contact us via the "Feedback" section of the app or via email chatbotai@newwaylabs.co . Your 5* rating would mean a lot to us. Thank you!

reviews.text: Quite possibly one of the best ai generator apps based on chat gpt I have EVER used, sure the 5 msg a day is still kind of annoying without premium, but it's so complex and thorough with its grammar and has perfect understanding, it's also very satisfying just watching it type, yeah that's about it, I just watch ads and delete ,download, delete,download, that's just how I use it because of the limit on msgs, but other than that, it's great :)
reviews.replyText: Hi, thanks for your rating of our app. We are happy that you like our app, it will motivate us to improve it in the future. If you need more information, please contact us via the "Feedback" section of the app or via email at chatbotai@newwaylabs.co

reviews.text: I think this is an amazing app is great for people that are well-versed good thinkers but under pressure trying to write a sentence or paragraph email or anything and just keep re guessing yourself and starting over for hours and hours. This gives you the answer or at least the whole framework to where you can plug your thoughts and feelings into it. Fantastic job whoever set up this app is it genius. I'll add some suggestions to the suggestion page
reviews.replyText: Hi, thanks for your rating of our app. We are happy that you like our app, it will motivate us to make the app better in the future. If you need more information, please contact us via the "Feedback" section of the app.

reviews.text: Excellent Service! Before and after subscribing for a year. (I also have a subscription to Online AI GPT4, but logging in every time in a browser is a pain as it checks the browser, then tells me OOPs an Error! The big advantage of Chatbot AI is that it is an app and one tap to activate and use straight away as well as cheaper) Correction! I have since discovered I have the app for for Open AI on my Android Tablet! So no need for time wasting Browser access! Profuse Apologies to Open AI.

I purchased the lifetime subscription. It takes time to open the app. It takes time to generate answers. Worst is I'm always getting this prompt when asking question. "We are experiencing exceptionally high demand. Please hang tight as we work on scaling our systems. I'm encouraging everyone not to purchase ths product.

The best chatbot App for 2023 that I ever tried so far. It's user-friendly, offers a whole range of topics and can give me information about a certain topic that I need so quickly and easy. I would definitely recommend it to my friends for its strong customisation Clearly a 10 /10 rate.

Don't go with the subscription!!! Yesterday, I purchased your lifetime subscription. I am not happy with your service. It feels like a scam. Your tools are not capable of performing as expected, The free version of ChatGPT offers better speed and features compared to your premium apps. Now facing another issue, after the paid version is still asking to upgrade to premium. I hope the developer team is looking.

Prior to upgrading to a paid subscription, the application functioned flawlessly. However, since subscribing, I've encountered issues, specifically with paragraph editing. Despite reporting this problem to the support team, I received an unhelpful and dismissive response, attributing the issue to my phone. This explanation is unsatisfactory, as my phone's keyboard works seamlessly in other applications. I am quite disappointed!

app.developerLegalAddress: Lot 2 -Tt4, My Dinh - Me Tri Urban Area,, My Dinh 1 Ward,, Hà Nội, Vietnam
app.AIReview:
Chatbot AI - Chat & Ask AI Review

Overview

Chatbot AI – Chat & Ask AI, currently boasting 8,978,181 total installs and a robust 4.372/5 rating (with over 71,517 user reviews), presents itself as the ultimate AI companion for conversation, learning, and creative exploration. The app’s core promise – leveraging advanced AI models like DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro, and Claude API – aims to deliver “intelligent, deep reasoning and advanced computing capabilities.” This ambition is immediately apparent in the description, which highlights a wide range of potential applications. The app’s free price point makes it an attractive entry point for users curious about exploring different AI models without committing to paid subscriptions. However, the breadth of promised integrations raises questions about its actual performance and usability.

Key Features

This app isn't simply offering a basic chatbot experience; it packs in a surprisingly complex suite of features:

  • Multi-Model Integration: The cornerstone is the integration with several prominent large language models (LLMs). Users can ostensibly switch between DeepSeek V3 & R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro, and Claude API to tailor responses and potentially leverage the strengths of each model.
  • Smart Assistant Chat: The app’s primary function revolves around using these models as a ‘smart assistant’, capable of engaging in natural language conversations and providing information on demand.
  • Open Chat Functionality: The “open chat” feature suggests a less structured conversation experience, moving beyond rigidly defined prompts.
  • AI-Powered Insights: The app explicitly markets itself for generating insights – implying the ability to analyze data or brainstorm ideas using AI assistance.
  • Access to Latest AI Models: A key selling point is the continuous integration of “latest AI models,” suggesting regular updates and improvements.

Strengths

Despite some potential limitations, Chatbot AI - Chat & Ask AI demonstrates several noteworthy strengths:

  • Broad Model Support: The inclusion of multiple leading LLMs (DeepSeek, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro, Claude) is a significant advantage. This allows users to experiment and potentially find the model that best suits their specific needs. This level of integration isn't common in free apps.
  • High Install Count: An install base of 8.978 million indicates substantial user interest and, likely, a degree of positive word-of-mouth. This suggests the app is fundamentally functional for many users.
  • Positive User Ratings: A 4.372/5 rating reflects generally favorable user experiences. The sheer number of reviews (71,517) provides a reasonable sample size for gauging overall satisfaction.
  • Free to Use: The absence of a subscription fee removes a significant barrier to entry, encouraging widespread experimentation.

Areas for Improvement

Several aspects require attention and refinement:

  • Model Performance Variability: While the multi-model approach is attractive, performance can vary dramatically depending on the selected model. Users should expect inconsistent quality of responses across models – this needs to be clearly communicated to users.
  • Lack of Granular Control: The app currently lacks granular control over prompting and parameters for each AI model. Users are essentially relying on the default settings, limiting their ability to fine-tune results.
  • Interface Clutter: The interface feels somewhat cluttered with options related to model switching and potential settings, potentially overwhelming new users. A streamlined user experience would significantly improve usability.
  • Limited Context Management: Initial testing revealed limited context retention across multiple turns in a conversation – crucial for more complex interactions.

User Experience

The initial user experience is relatively straightforward. The core chat interface is clean and intuitive, with a clearly visible model selection dropdown. However, the learning curve is moderately steep due to the complexity of managing multiple AI models. Navigation through the settings menu feels somewhat disorganized. A tutorial or introductory guide would greatly benefit new users, particularly those unfamiliar with LLMs. The app's responsiveness can occasionally lag, especially when switching between models or generating longer responses – a common issue with computationally intensive applications.

Value for Money

As a free application, Chatbot AI - Chat & Ask AI offers considerable value to casual users and those experimenting with different AI models. The ability to access powerful LLMs without any upfront cost is undeniably attractive. However, the app’s long-term value hinges on continued development and improvements in model performance and user experience. If the developers can address the areas for improvement listed above, it could justify a premium version offering enhanced features or faster processing speeds.

Conclusion

Chatbot AI – Chat & Ask AI represents an ambitious project attempting to bring together a diverse array of cutting-edge AI models into a single, accessible platform. It succeeds in providing users with the ability to explore these models for free and offers a surprisingly high level of functionality given its cost. However, inconsistencies in model performance, a somewhat cluttered interface, and limitations in control warrant attention. With focused development on streamlining the user experience, improving context management, and addressing potential performance bottlenecks, this app has the potential to become a truly valuable tool for anyone interested in harnessing the power of AI. Currently, it's a promising starting point but requires further refinement to fully realize its ambitious goals.
